name: LANGDON
description: Introducing the Langdon where smart design meets attainable luxury. This 1,900 sq. ft. home offers 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a 2-car garage on a generous quarter-acre lot. Built with hurricane-impact protection and modern, energy-efficient features, it's engineered for both comfort and security. The Langdon's open layout, elegant finishes, and abundant natural light elevate everyday living. It's the ideal choice for buyers seeking a new construction home that delivers style and durability without the premium price tag.
